Text.Page:
Greetings, .
You're here for the banquet, aren't you?
You enjoy the banquet with the people for the second time. As for the mysterious man...

Hello, .

I've heard stories about your exploits. In many ways, this banquet is in your honor!

Even the weather today is great!

You've arrived at a good time. The banquet should start soon.
Please help yourself.

! I'm so glad you made it!

The federation was so grateful to me for my small part in helping you stop the dragons, they invited me to the banquet!

Shall we go in? This is a great night for a banquet!

, as you have guessed, you are the only mortal who recalls the death of Velik.

Thanks to your efforts, peace once again reigns over the world.

Though I am the Goddess of Fate, I have bent it to my will once too often. I must say my farewells for now.

The dark future that you saw, the one only you remember... you must never forget.

Go, now. The people are waiting for you. Be with those whose lives you made possible.

Greetings, . May I see your invitation?

Ah! You're ! Welcome.

Seir is waiting for you.
Please visit the headquarters before you enjoy the banquet.

Hello.
Are you enjoying the banquet?
Oh, I should introduce myself. I'm a scholar, researching monsters. I came for a conference with Seir, about my research."Are you from Elenea?"

Originally, yes... but how did you know that? I have a twin brother who still lives in Elenea.

He's doing some strange research... I'm not sure what it's about. He was keeping a journal about it... but then lost all the pages. There's probably some pretty valuable information in there, for whoever finds the right pages...

This is all thanks to you. I don't know how so many dragons appeared in one place like that, but I guess we were lucky you just happened to be there.

I'm still reading through reports about the incident.

But enough business! You're here to have fun, . That's an order!

Hello, ! I'm glad you were able to make it!

We have lots prepared today!

In fact, it's almost time for the play.

Why don't you start off the festivities by watching the play?"That would be a nice change."

You'll find the stage over there, to my right. Take any spot you wish, and enjoy.

Seir will be making a speech immediately after the play.

Plays are such an interesting form of art.

The actors, the directing, and all the objects in the play... everything is made up. But for the duration of the play, it is all absolutely real.

Interesting, how a play can substitute one reality for another.

It's as if we experience an... alternate reality, to the one we know.

This is really quite inspiring! Perhaps someday I will create a play of my own."What kind of play?"

You like my idea?

Please, keep this to yourself!

My play would tell the story of a hero who saves the world, but the twist is that the world doesn't know what the hero did.

Only the hero knows there even was a threat.

What do you think?

Greetings. Are you enjoying the banquet?

Personally, I loved it. The food was quite delectable."What did you have?"

I had the Bleak Wings.

The struthio breast with the sauce was just fascinating! How in the world can you make a struthio breast taste like that?

Although... the name is a little off-putting.

Every time I see the cooking process, it makes me feel that something could happen to the Goddess's wing. Hmm...

Thank you, but you are the one the city should be congratulating.

I know I say this sort of thing a lot, but we really don't know what we'd do without you.

!
I almost forgot! We got you a souvenir.
It must have slipped my mind, but I wanted to make sure you got it before you left us again.

Here. May it serve you well.
